name: Efficiency Wallet
description:
Those of us who tend to accumulate ticket stubs and coffee punch-cards, along with everything else, may find living conditions a bit snug.  However, those who travel light and would rather avoid lower-back pain, will find the Efficiency has plenty of space for all your day-to-day necessities (including a coffee punch-card, or three).

*3 oz domestic veg-tan leather shell is lined with Italian Lambskin.
*Wallet Measures 4" x 6" when open.
*Stitched by hand, using heavy, waxed saddle-thread.
*Made one-at-a-time in Madison, WI.

name: Delmore Dog Lead
description:
Cut from domestic, veg-tan saddle leather, the Delmore leash measures six feet long and features a two-piece design that allows for a more ergonomic grip.  The 13 oz leather is nearly 1/4" thick, and will develop a rich golden-brown color with continuous use.

*Leash measures 3/4" wide 
*American made, Nickle-plated brass hardware.
*Removable heavy duty swivel clip.
*Handmade in Madison, WI.

name: Roll Buckle Belt- Natural
description:
Cut from 11 oz domestic bull hide, which has received no oils or dyes, this natural veg-tan belt will darken to a rich golden-brown with consistent wear.  The stainless steal roll buckle is held in place with four chicago screws, which can be easily removed with a flat-head screwdriver.

*Belt measures 1 1/2 inches in width.
*Leather and hardware made in the United States.
*Handmade in Madison, WI.

NOTE:  Belts are custom made to order.  Measure the belt you currently wear, from the tip of the buckle prong, to the hole you currently use.  Please email this measurement to engineleather@gmail.com after you place your order.  Your belt will be punched with this measurement at the center hole.  Belts will be punched with five holes unless otherwise specified.

name: Maxwell Braces
description:
Custom-sized suspenders are cut from premium 9 oz domestic vegetable-tanned bull hide, which will develop a rich golden-brown patina with age and wear.  Braces fasten to belt loops with 3 heavy-duty trigger-snaps.

*Suspender straps measure one inch in width
*Brushed Nickel-plated, solid Brass hardware, made in the U.S.
*Hand cut, punched and stitched in Madison, WI.

NOTE: Braces are cut to order.  To figure out the length you need, put on your favorite jeans and measure the length from the top of the center rear belt-loop, over your right shoulder, to the top of the front belt-loop on the right.  MAKE SURE THE TAPE MEASURE IS NICE AND SNUG (a cloth tape works the best).  
Please email this measurement to engineleather@gmail.com after you checkout.

If you have a question regarding proper measurement, or anything else, for that matter, you can send them to the above address, or go to the contact page.
